item.description:
The Date was changed because of the snow.

This is a nonfiction account of the experience of one family during Hurricane Katrina. The father is Syrian-American and it is intense reading what happened to him in the aftermath of the storm.

We are going to try a new location - Andala Cafe, also located near Central square. www.andalacafe.com I have not had a chance to check it out personally but one of our esteemed members recommends it so let's try it. I believe it has two floors so we may not be immediately visible as you enter.

Unfortunately, they do not have a liquor license. I had hoped to at least have some of our meetings over a glass of wine.

As always, if you have any questions or suggestions or feedback, please email me.
item.name: Zeitoun by D. Eggers
